title: Print, "The Mirror of Yedo (Yedo Kagami), No. 36", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: The Mirror of Yedo
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 36 / Yedo Kagami.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves deep magenta; inner leaves white with violet tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Mirror of Yedo (Yedo Kagami), No. 36", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.7 x 27.9 cm (16 x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-89.
